raw_body: Dearly loved husband of Therese, loving father of Shanaka, loving fatherin- law of Shaan, darling Aththa of Nikhil and Kimaya, passed away peacefully on the 26th of December. Remains will lie at A.F. Raymonds, Borella from 9.30 a.m. on Thursday the 28th of December. Cremation at 4 p.m. at the old crematorium.
